content: in this legal case a court in ferrara made a final ruling on a real estate dispute between multiple parties the court declared the dissolution of a community property and assigned full ownership of different properties to the parties involved these properties included a civil dwelling a warehouse a shed and land the courtappointed expert prepared a plan outlining how the properties would be divided the parties also disagreed on how expenses should be allocated but the court decided that they should be shared equally the court also ordered the cancellation of any mortgages on the properties and stated that the parties involved should fully compensate the court for its costs the ruling was made on may 26 2023 and filed with the court registry on june 1 2023
